alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:24AM AKST until January 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts as high as 40 mph will reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant blowing and drifting of snow is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
